name: CHOP (itch) (JacobJanerka, NuclearFriend)
description:
Hello, I am looking for strong (muscular, bulbous muscles if possible, shiny preferred) individual to come to my planet and chop down some pest tree's that are ruining my property.

This is a paid job;

Contact me at 0454 1xx xxx

CONTROLS
  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Chop
CREDITS
  • Jacob Janerka (@JacobJanerka) - Art
  • Jonathan Murphy (@nuclearfriend) - Code
  • Dmitri Golovko - Music/SFX
